title: Ongoing Issue for 4 Months
body: Ever since around the middle of December I have not been able to play League of Legends except directly after an update. When I click 'Launch' nothing ever comes up, I have tried to reinstall and repair multiple times and they spontaneously work on the odd occasion but never consistently, what can I do to fix this?

replies.body:
Have you tried cleaning the registry with something like CCleaner? You can use its free license to just clean, and it's pretty good at finding things that are out of order.

Have you tried running the game in admin mode? You can setup a shortcut to always open League to avoid any problems like this in the future, that is if that is the cause of your problem.

Above all, though, make sure your Windows and its graphics drivers are up to date. Riot always presume you have the latest.

Best of luck.
Well I usually do all of that on a regular basis, as to my issue it seems to have resolved itself as per usual so I am fine for now, thankyou

It's not really resolved then, per se.

But if it's just mysteriously, consistently working know, I guess there's not much to be done.

Good fortune!

My game does that too, once i press i play, but what i do is open it a few times in a row, and eventually it lets me on, a thing pops up saying another instance of lol is running just click ok, rinse n repeat till it works, sometimes its 4 or 5 times for me
I try this all the time and it never works, but I will do it consecutively to see if it makes a difference, thankyou
